Title: encfs: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in encfs, the worst of
    which can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a
    Denial of Service condition.

Background.Text: Encfs is an implementation of encrypted filesystem in user-space using FUSE.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in encfs. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A local attacker can utilize a possible buffer overflow in the encodeName method of StreamNameIO and BlockNameIO to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service. Also multiple weak cryptographics practices have been found in encfs.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.
